title: Loan Payment Due Soon: #LPD-10-2024-001
description: Your loan payment for account #LPD-10-2024-001 is due by 31.10.2024. Please ensure funds are available for the scheduled payment.
frequency: Notification 7 days before the due date

title: Approval Needed for High-Value Transaction
description: A transaction of €500,000 requires your approval. Please review and approve within 24 hours.
frequency: One-time notification upon detection of large transaction

title: Currency Exchange Rate Threshold Reached
description: The EUR/USD exchange rate has dropped below your set threshold of 1.10. Please review your hedging strategy.
frequency: Real-time alert when the threshold is met

title: Potential Fraudulent Activity Detected: #FAD-10-2024-XYZ
description: Suspicious activity has been identified on account #FAD-10-2024-XYZ. Please verify recent transactions.
frequency: Immediate notification when fraud detection flags suspicious activity

title: Upcoming Quarterly Financial Report Due
description: Your Q3 financial report is due by 10.11.2024. Please submit the necessary documents via the client portal.
frequency: Reminder 14 days before the submission deadline

title: Credit Line Utilization Alert: #ACA-10-2024-XYZ
description: You have utilized 85% of your credit line on account #ACA-10-2024-XYZ. Please review your available credit.
frequency: One-time notification when credit line usage exceeds 80%

title: Payment Approval Deadline Approaching
description: A payment of €200,000 requires approval by 17:00 today to avoid delays. Please approve the transaction in the system.
frequency: One-time alert a few hours before the deadline

title: New Regulatory Requirements
description: Recent regulatory changes may impact your investment strategy. Please review the latest compliance guidelines.

title: Low Liquidity Warning: #TR-11-2024-001
description: Liquidity on treasury account #TR-11-2024-001 has fallen below the set threshold of €100,000. Please transfer funds to maintain required balances.
frequency: Real-time alert when liquidity falls below the threshold

title: KYC Update Required
description: Your annual KYC information needs to be updated by 01.12.2024. Please provide the necessary documentation to remain compliant.
frequency: Reminder 30 days before the KYC update deadline
